metadata.title: CVE-2021-30500 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Null pointer dereference was found in upx PackLinuxElf::canUnpack() in p_lx_elf.cpp,in version UPX 4.0.0. That allow attackers to execute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
